CustomField.description: if you change the Account Type when checking the PEO New Client Meeting date you also need to change the code in ReferenceHRGcontroller, method checkOnboardingDates
CustomField.formula:
IF(ISPICKVAL(Account__r.Type,"PEO Client"),
IF(Onboarding_Start_Date__c >= DATE(2018,10,15) , ( IF( ISBLANK( CC_Meeting__c ),0,1)+ IF( ISBLANK( X1st_Invoice_Review__c ),0,1)+ IF( ISBLANK( HR_Assessment_Completed__c ),0,1)+ IF( ISBLANK( Reference_Manual_Review__c ),0,1)+ IF( ISBLANK( PEO_New_Client_Meeting__c ),0,1)+ IF( ISBLANK( STO_Meeting__c),0,1)+ IF( ISBLANK( PEO_Handbook__c),0,1)+ IF( NOT(ISNULL( HR_Action_Plan_Meeting__c )),1,0) ) / 8, ( IF( ISBLANK( CC_Meeting__c ),0,1)+ IF( ISBLANK( X1st_Invoice_Review__c ),0,1)+ IF( ISBLANK( HR_Assessment_Completed__c ),0,1)+ IF( ISBLANK( Reference_Manual_Review__c ),0,1)+ IF( ISBLANK( PEO_New_Client_Meeting__c ),0,1)+ IF( ISBLANK( STO_Meeting__c),0,1)+ IF( NOT(ISNULL( HR_Action_Plan_Meeting__c )),1,0) ) / 7 )
, ( IF( ISBLANK( HR_Assessment_Completed__c ),0,1)+ IF( NOT(ISNULL( HR_Action_Plan_Meeting__c )),1,0) ) /2
)
CustomField.label: Onboarding % Completed
